Join us!

Currently 360Player is not searching to fill any vacancies, however, we are always open to bringing exceptional people into our team.

Our head office is located in central Stockholm with multiple offices abroad. If you’re interested in joining us in our mission to change the world of football, don’t hesitate to send your CV and personal letter to people@360player.com.
